---
title: Getting started
---
You can find practical for users starting with Yoda on the Handbook. The documentation is split into the following sections:

- **Yoda Portal** - Describes the functionality of the Yoda web portal, including inviting colleagues.

- **Using Yoda** - Practical tips on adding metadata and using Yoda in your workflow.

- **Securing and Distributing Data** - How to archive and publish your data in Yoda.

- **Data Access and Transfer** - Different ways to upload and download your data.

More information can be found on the [SURF User Knowledge base](https://servicedesk.surf.nl/wiki/display/WIKI/Yoda+Hosting).

The [Yoda site of Utrecht University](https://www.uu.nl/en/research/Yoda) also contains useful information and is being redeveloped so it can also be used by VU Amsterdam and the other Consortium Partners.
